row.cell: To paying for renewal of insurance
To Ribbon be. for chip hat
To pasturing cow, sold in Oct.,
By order upon A D. Zucker
To cash mend for hoop poles
" to horse cart to draw stones
" Wall x Knowles work x sand
To 8, lbs 4 ½ oz lead pipe for gutters 3/5 5 ½ x
To 51 feet of wide pine plank
